void setLogger(PyObject *logger)¶

Sets the logger object.

Parameters
  • logger: the log object that is written out to

void setLogFunction(PyObject *log_function)¶

Sets the logger function.

Parameters
  • log_function: the function that will be used for writing out logs

void writeInfo(string message)¶

Writes a message to the log object with level 20.

Parameters
  • message: the message to write out

void write(const int &level, string message)¶

Writes a message to the log object with the supplied leve.

Parameters
  • level: the logging level to write out at
  • message: the message to write out

Writes a message to the log object with the supplied leve.

Parameters

  • message: the message to write out
